CEO and founder of Rev-ID International Ltd, creators of the FoundationFootprintâ„¢ enterprise carbon accounting software.

Born in the UK, Chris worked as a DBA, programmer and eventually architect for large corporates like British Telecom, government agencies like Queensland (Australia) State Government and dot coms like Asite.com.
